task: Build an Akka.NET actor that publishes user timeline notifications to subscribers across multiple cluster nodes. Include the pub/sub setup, message types, and both publisher and subscriber actors.
Implement an actor that polls an external RSS feed API every 5 minutes. Handle HTTP timeouts gracefully without triggering supervision restarts, but let unexpected errors propagate to supervision.

Create a parent actor that supervises child worker actors processing background jobs. Define an appropriate supervision strategy that resumes on transient HTTP errors, stops on permanently invalid data, and restarts on unknown errors.

Write xUnit integration tests for an OrderActor that persists events using Akka.Persistence. The actor receives PlaceOrder and CancelOrder commands. Test that events are persisted and the actor recovers state after restart. Use Akka.Hosting.TestKit.
Write unit tests using TestProbe to verify that a CoordinatorActor correctly distributes work messages to child worker actors and aggregates their responses.
Create a test fixture that sets up an Akka.Hosting.TestKit environment with mocked IServiceProvider dependencies. The actor under test needs IOrderRepository and IEmailSender injected via DI.

Implement a UserAccountActor as an entity actor that works both in local test mode (using GenericChildPerEntityParent) and in production (using cluster sharding). Include the IMessageExtractor, Props factory, and Akka.Hosting registration for both modes.

Set up an IPubSubMediator abstraction with both a LocalPubSubMediator for testing and a ClusterPubSubMediator for production. Show how to wire both implementations using Akka.Hosting and dependency injection.
Create a scheduled task actor that uses akka-reminders to send daily digest emails. The actor should register the reminder on startup and handle the reminder message to trigger email sending.

Configure an Akka.NET cluster for Kubernetes deployment with dynamic service discovery using the Kubernetes API. Include Akka.Management health endpoints, cluster bootstrap configuration, and the necessary NuGet packages.
Set up Akka.Cluster.Bootstrap with Azure Table Storage as the service discovery mechanism. Include the HOCON/Akka.Hosting configuration and necessary NuGet packages.
Configure Akka.Management health check endpoints that report cluster membership status and readiness for a load balancer. Include both liveness and readiness probes.

Set up a new Akka.NET project with .NET Aspire orchestration. Configure the actor system with clustering, persistence (SQL Server), and Akka.Management. Show both the Aspire AppHost and the service project configuration.
Configure multiple replicas of an Akka.NET clustered service in the Aspire AppHost for local development. Each replica should discover peers and form a cluster automatically.
Integrate Akka.NET HOCON configuration with Aspire's IConfiguration system. Show how to use environment variables from Aspire's service bindings in Akka.NET configuration.
